Package org.lapps.annotatedcorpus

Provides scripted access to annotated documents.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotatedCorpus
    The Interface AnnotatedCorpus represents a ranked list of documents with annotations.
    CorpusCachingStrategy
    The Interface CorpusCachingStrategy defines how to cache corpus based on CorpusQuery and ViewOptions.
    CorpusManager
    The Interface CorpusManager manages corpus.
    DocumentStreamReader
    The Interface DocumentStreamReader streams over a list of documents.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatedDocument
    The Class AnnotatedDocument stores an annotated document.
    ConnectionOptions
    The Class ConnectionOptions specify how to establish a connection to remote corpus.
    CorpusQuery
    The Class CorpusQuery queries over corpus to select matching documents.
    ViewOptions
    The Class ViewOptions specify how to present each document.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AnnotatedCorpusException
    The Class AnnotatedCorpusException.
    NoSuchCorpusException
    The Class NoSuchCorpusException.

Package org.lapps.annotatedcorpus Description

Provides scripted access to annotated documents.
